ModMetaData.name: Flush Biosculpter Tuning
ModMetaData.author: cyanobot
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an option to the biosculpter pod to clear the biotuning so that it can tune to someone else. If you have the tech to build a new one, why can't you reset it to its default state?
The flush cycle takes a little while (7 days default, configurable) and consumes power as if running a normal cycle.
